mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.costtype AS "costtype", a.costunit AS "costunit", a.year1 AS "year1", a.year2 AS "year2", a.year3 AS "year3", a.pkproductcost AS "fea_productcost.id", a.year4 AS "year4", a.year5 AS "year5", a.year6 AS "year6", a.year7 AS "year7", a.year8 AS "year8", a.year9 AS "year9", a.year10 AS "year10", a.year11 AS "year11", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.year12 AS "year12", a.year13 AS "year13", a.year14 AS "year14", a.year15 AS "year15", a.year16 AS "year16", a.year17 AS "year17", a.year18 AS "year18", a.year19 AS "year19", a.year20 AS "year20", a.year21 AS "year21", a.year22 AS "year22", a.year23 AS "year23", a.year24 AS "year24", a.year25 AS "year25", a.year26 AS "year26", a.year27 AS "year27", a.year28 AS "year28", a.year29 AS "year29", a.year30 AS "year30", a.year31 AS "year31", a.year32 AS "year32"
LEFT JOIN fea_productcost b ON b.id = a.pkproductcost
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fea_productcostb( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, costtype, costunit, year1, year2, year3, pkproductcost, year4, year5, year6, year7, year8, year9, year10, year11, remarks, year12, year13, year14, year15, year16, year17, year18, year19, year20, year21, year22, year23, year24, year25, year26, year27, year28, year29, year30, year31, year32 ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{costtype}, #{costunit}, #{year1}, #{year2}, #{year3}, #{fea_productcost.id}, #{year4}, #{year5}, #{year6}, #{year7}, #{year8}, #{year9}, #{year10}, #{year11}, #{remarks}, #{year12}, #{year13}, #{year14}, #{year15}, #{year16}, #{year17}, #{year18}, #{year19}, #{year20}, #{year21}, #{year22}, #{year23}, #{year24}, #{year25}, #{year26}, #{year27}, #{year28}, #{year29}, #{year30}, #{year31}, #{year32} )
mapper.update: UPDATE fea_productcostb SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, costtype = #{costtype}, costunit = #{costunit}, year1 = #{year1}, year2 = #{year2}, year3 = #{year3}, pkproductcost = #{fea_productcost.id}, year4 = #{year4}, year5 = #{year5}, year6 = #{year6}, year7 = #{year7}, year8 = #{year8}, year9 = #{year9}, year10 = #{year10}, year11 = #{year11}, remarks = #{remarks}, year12 = #{year12}, year13 = #{year13}, year14 = #{year14}, year15 = #{year15}, year16 = #{year16}, year17 = #{year17}, year18 = #{year18}, year19 = #{year19}, year20 = #{year20}, year21 = #{year21}, year22 = #{year22}, year23 = #{year23}, year24 = #{year24}, year25 = #{year25}, year26 = #{year26}, year27 = #{year27}, year28 = #{year28}, year29 = #{year29}, year30 = #{year30}, year31 = #{year31}, year32 = #{year32} WHERE id = #{id}
